author: smuzaffar
body:
Fixes https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/42161

[template <typename T> void PixelThresholdClusterizer::clusterizeDetUnitT](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoLocalTracker/SiPixelClusterizer/plugins/PixelThresholdClusterizer.cc#L130-L135 ) is template function and it should not be in `cc` file. Moving it to a separate header file and then including it, where it is needed, fixes the ppc64le gcc12 build/link errors.
title: moved PixelThresholdClusterizer::clusterizeDetUnitT template function in separate header
